descripcion:
C4-PRO DWARF is designed for compact densely grown warm season turf. The formula works to enhance plant health and color while minimizing growth traits that require heavy maintenance. C4-PRO DWARF influences the plant growth characteristics by providing a specifically balanced formula of macronutrients and micronutrients. The mineral and nutrient combination is designed to grow green upright turgid leaf blades with minimal root sprawl thatch development.

DERIVED FROM: Potassium Nitrate, Ammonium Nitrate, Magnesium Sulfate, Ammonium Sulfate, Iron EDDHA, Iron EDTA, Magnesium EDTA, Copper EDTA, Zinc EDTA, Boric Acid, Sodium Molybdate. F1367.

POTENTIAL ACIDITY: 126 lbs calcium carbonate equivalent per ton.

SOLUBILITY (max.): 2.0 lbs per gallon in cold water. Hot water and agitation improve solubility.
